metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2659 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
It was found that dropbear before version 2013.59 with GSSAPI leaks whethergiven username is valid or invalid. When an invalid username is given, theGSSAPI authentication failure was incorrectly counted towards the maximumallowed number of password attempts.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2659` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dropbear - 2017.75-3build1
dropbear-bin - 2017.75-3build1
dropbear-initramfs - 2017.75-3build1
dropbear-run - 2017.75-3build1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: dropbear package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2017.75-3build1').
